p.k: Ben and Gwen spend the day volunteering at Repto Ranch and come face to face with King Koil, but need to overcome their fear of snakes if they are to defeat the slithery baddie. / With the Rust Bucket stopped on the Midwest roadside, Ben locks himself inside with his tablet as Max and Gwen enjoy the great outdoors. / Ben learns that recently discovered "space stuff" is being examined in the space museum's lab. But once The Stuff replicates our hero, Ben must stop the case of mistaken identity. / During a trip to the Lake of the Ozarks, Max gets word of a suspicious rockslide nearby. Ben and Gwen must stop their quarrel if they are to rescue the trapped miners. / Ben stumbles upon a Xingo arcade game and goes OE-Shock Rock to power it up, but when it receives too much juice, Xingo leaps out into the real world.
